title: Coding Challenges
description: In rare occasions there are jobs that attempt to simulate what you'll do day to day, distilled into a few hours in an interview; and in every case I've heard they're unrealistic and ablest -- even with attempts to accommodate disabilities. It isn't productive to just lament that the industry wasn't made for me, thankfully I've built a great career for myself, but occasionally I enter the fray. Here's a list of my most notable exercises:
